value.title: Get Started with Power BI PowerShell | Install PowerShell Cmdlets for Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will talk about how we can get started with the Power BI PowerShell. For any organization, if we wish to perform some admin related tasks easily and in faster manner, PowerShell is the best option. So many operations we can perform very easily and faster.  This is the first introduction

value.title: How to Publish Power BI Report using PowerShell Cmdlet | Publish Power BI report using PowerShell
value.excerpt: During this video we will learn, how we can easily publish our Power BI report using PowerShell command. value.title: Download Power BI Report File Using Windows PowerShell | PowerShell to Export Power BI Report File
value.excerpt: During this video we will learn, how we can easily download published Power BI report file(.pbix) file using PowerShell command. value.title: Get List of All Workspaces as an Admin Using Windows PowerShell | PowerShell and Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can get the list of All the available Workspaces in Power BI tenant. Power BI provides PowerShell Administrator API. Using these APIs we can get the list of all workspaces based on the logged-in user. If you have access to Power BI Service Administrator, then we can

value.title: Check How many Workspaces do user have access using Windows PowerShell | Power BI using PowerShell
value.excerpt: Sometimes there is a situation when we need to identify how many Workspaces does the user have access. value.title: Create a New Power BI Workspace Using Power Shell | Power BI with PowerShell
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can create a new Power BI Workspace using PowerShell.  Power BI Powershell provides us the flexibility to create a new Workspace by running just one single command. Once we create the Power BI Workspace, we can also add a description of the Workspace using the Power

value.title: Add Users to Power BI Workspace Using Power BI PowerShell | Power BI and PowerShell
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can add the users to the Power BI Workspace using Windows PowerShell. value.title: Remove Users From Power BI Workspace Using Power BI PowerShell | Power BI and PowerShell
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can remove the users from the Power BI Workspace using Windows PowerShell.   Power BI PowerShell provides us with the flexibility to remove user permission from the specific Workspace. In this video, we will learn how we can remove the user using the PowerShell Script.
